data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 30Th May, 2022.
data.news_body: With reference to intimation submitted to Exchanges vide our letter dated 22nd May, 2022, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today, i.e. 30th May, 2022 which commenced at 3.00 p.m. and concluded at 5.30 p.m., have consider and approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the 4th quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On February 09, 2022.
data.news_body: This has reference to our letter dated 31st January, 2022, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today, i.e. 09th February, 2022 which commenced at 02.30 p.m. and concluded at 04.40 p.m., inter alia, transacted the following business:

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 01, 2021
data.news_body: This has reference to our letter dated 18th October, 2021, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today, i.e. 01st November, 2021 which commenced at 05.00 p.m. and concluded at 06.15 p.m., inter alia, took on record and duly approved the unaudited financial results of the Company for the 2nd quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2021 along with the Limited Review Report, which is enclosed herewith as Annexure - I.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On August 10, 2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations'), the Board of Directors have inter-alia approved and taken on record the following at its meeting held today i.e. August 10, 2021:

1. Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the 1st quarter ended June 30, 2021 along with the Limited Review Report, which is enclosed herewith as Annexure - I.

2. The date of 31st Annual General Meeting of the Company for the financial year 2020-21 has been fixed by the Board of Directors and the same is scheduled to be held on Friday, September 24, 2021 at 11.30 p.m. through Video Conferencing (VC)/ Other Audio Visual Means (OAVM).

The Meeting commenced at 3.00 p.m. and concluded at 5.45 p.m.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 30Th June, 2021.
data.news_body: With reference to intimation submitted to Exchanges vide our letter dated 19th June, 2021, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today, i.e. 30th June, 2021 which commenced at 3.00 p.m. and concluded at 4.40 p.m., have consider and approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the 4th quarter and year ended on 31st March, 2021.
